== Pacific Northwest Loco Team Projects ==

Below is a list of active and completed team projects.  Please feel free to contact the individuals involved for specific details.  If you would like to request assistance or make a suggestion for a team project please email us: ubuntu-us-pnw@lists.ubuntu.com.  If you are a team member and need information on how to initiate a new team project please contact <nowiki>[[mailto:dshufelt@gmail.com|Dan Shufelt]]</nowiki> (documentation is in the process of being written).
